EmailTemplate.description: Invite a contact to a Commerce Reorder Portal.
EmailTemplate.name: Commerce Reorder Portal: Invitation
EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to {!Community_Name}
EmailTemplate.emailContent:
Dear {!Receiving_User.FirstName},

Check out this reorder portal for a simpler way to place repeat orders with {!Organization.Name}. You can view your past orders, modify quantities, place new orders, and view order statuses.

Click the link for access: {!Community_Name} Username: {!Receiving_User.Username}

Regards,
{!User.Name}
